author: Rebecca Shabad
title: AFT launches ads blasting Trump for accusing health care workers of stealing masks
description: In new television and online ads, nurses and healthcare workers blast President Donald Trump for accusing them of stealing personal protective equipment (PPE).
content: WASHINGTON The American Federation of Teachers is launching a new round of television and online ads featuring nurses and health care workers blasting President Donald Trump for accusing them of stealing personal protective equipment (PPE), the tools these wo… [+28082 chars]
